summary: Admin gating infrastructure and a footer Admin quick link were added, plus backend ticket submission and admin-only status update. However, the diff summary does not provide evidence that the required password modal/validation flow is implemented, nor that an admin-protected backend endpoint exists to list quote/quote-form tickets for an admin “Quotes” view.

missing_requirements.requirement: Hide the admin panel UI by default and only reveal it after the user clicks an "Admin" quick link and successfully enters the password "PonytaPower17!" (including modal prompt, exact password check, error message on failure, scroll-to-admin on success, and not persisting unlock across refresh).
missing_requirements.reason: The provided diff summary does not include changes to the header/admin panel rendering or any password prompt/modal implementation or password verification logic. Only an AdminGateContext (unlock state + prompt open/close) is shown, but no UI for entering/verifying "PonytaPower17!" or error handling is evidenced.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (only mentions App/SiteHeader changes; not shown in actual diff)

missing_requirements.requirement: Within the unlocked admin panel, show quote requests in an admin "Quote Forms"/"Quotes" view and ensure the backend endpoint used to list tickets is admin-protected (rejects non-admin callers).
missing_requirements.reason: backend/main.mo shows storing tickets, public submission, and an admin-only status update, but no admin-protected query/list endpoint for retrieving all tickets is evidenced in the truncated diff. Also, no concrete admin UI implementation for a quotes list (with fields and empty state) is shown in the actual modified files.
evidence: backend/main.mo (truncated; shows submitContactForm, updateTicketStatus, isTicketCompleted but no list endpoint)
frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions AdminOrderManagementSection tabs/quote forms, but underlying file is not part of the shown diffs)

hallucinated_features.description: Backend access-control initialization and diagnostic endpoints (initializeAccessControl, getInitializationStatus) plus user profile read/write endpoints.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any requirement; REQ-3 only calls for an admin-protected ticket listing endpoint (and quote visibility), not adding a broader access-control initialization flow or user profile system.
